name: Rasen no Sora
description:
※ This game is a personal work using the early access system.

"Rasen no Sora" is a turn-based strategy simulation game with space-fleet battle.
(Battle part is real time system)

Control your planets, develop new technology, adjust fighting power, command the fleet at the battlefield, destroy all enemy.

Scenario-mode and Radom-Map-mode available.

Under the concept of "Space Fleet x Character Game", further functions are planned to be added in the future.

◆ There is...
-Fleet warfare
-Simple domestic policy, diplomatic factors
-Original character creating function

◆ There is no...
-Story (character setting, scenario, event etc.)
-Graphics, effects
-A smart AI
